title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile-Based Critical Newsroom Design for Workplace Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital device usage and experience in consuming news media
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can execute the news production process step-by-step in a mobile environment
Critical evaluation of at least three limitations of existing newsroom systems through real-case analysis

Learners can map three core elements of a newsroom operation model (e.g., automation, data-driven decision-making) to their work field (e.g., marketing, customer analysis) and document a 3-step action plan (including goals, methods, and evaluation criteria) executable within a week.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
